posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
Fellow character builders, I finally managed to be back. I won't delve into the issues that kept me away, but they involve also my inability to log in into these forums for a while.

Now, let's all get back to character building.

Cheers!

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
KailPendragon wrote:Fellow character builders, I finally managed to be back. I won't delve into the issues that kept me away, but they involve also my inability to log in into these forums for a while.

Now, let's all get back to character building.

Cheers!
I feel you, mate, but as for me, my seclusion period isn't over yet. I still don't know when I'll be able to log regularly, but we'll see. Keep the boys working while I'm gone, things have been rather quiet of late.

Welcome back!

posts.author: Templar
posts.content: Welcome Back!
